EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Astral Touch
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain the Magical Training feat.
Each core ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to all Spell DCs +50 Maximum Spell Points +5 Fire, Light, Alignment, Positive, and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Deepening Faith
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +10% Destiny bonus to Maximum Spell Points, and your Echoes of Power now restores up to 30 Spell Points. This ability does not stack with other Epic Destiny abilities that modify your Echoes of Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Angelic Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are able to leap through the air to bring the fight to your enemies or traverse chasms that make normal adventurers balk. Uses of this ability recharge at a rate of one every 15 seconds in private areas, and 3 seconds in public areas. If you already have the Leap of Faith feat, it now recharges at a rate of one every 12 seconds in private areas instead. Cooldown: 3 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Heavenly Leap
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an option to improve your Angelic Charge or Leap of Faith

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heavenly Blessing
EnhancementSelection.Description: When you finish an Angelic Charge or Leap of Faith, you and allies near you take 1d6+2 plus 1 per caster level Positive Healing. This healing scales with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heavenly Wrath
EnhancementSelection.Description: When you use Angelic Charge or Leap of Faith, enemies you fly through take 1d6+3 Light damage per caster level and 1d6+3 Fire damage per caster level. This damage scales with Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Subtle Flame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -[10/20/30]% Spell Threat. Rank 3: +5 Fire, Light, Positive, Alignment, and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Born by Flame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Fire and Light Resistance Rank 3: You gain +5% Fire and Light absorption

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Destiny Mantle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Destiny Mantle.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Angelic Form
EnhancementSelection.Description: Exalted Angel Destiny Mantle: Your offensive Fire spells deal 1d6+6 bonus Fire damage per caster level, and your offensive Light and Alignment spells now deal 1d6+6 bonus Light damage per caster level. Your Positive Healing spells heal 1d6 extra Positive Healing per caster level. These effects each have a unique cooldown of 5 seconds.

Stance.Name: Angelic Form
Stance.Description: Exalted Angel Destiny Mantle: Your offensive Fire spells deal 1d6+6 bonus Fire damage per caster level, and your offensive Light and Alignment spells now deal 1d6+6 bonus Light damage per caster level. Your Positive Healing spells heal 1d6 extra Positive Healing per caster level. These effects each have a unique cooldown of 5 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wrathful Form
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Exalted Angel Destiny Mantle: Casting a Fire, Light, Alignment, or Positive Spell causes you to be surrounded by fire and light for 5 seconds, damaging all enemies nearby every 2.5 seconds for 1d6 Fire and 1d6 Light damage per caster level. This damage will not strike dazed targets unless they are also stunned. Subsequent spellcasts extend the duration by an additional 5 seconds, up to a maximum of 15. This ability ends when you leave combat.
Your Positive Healing spells heal 1d6 extra Positive Healing per caster level. This has a cooldown of 5 seconds before it can trigger again.

Stance.Name: Wrathful Form
Stance.Description:
Exalted Angel Destiny Mantle: Casting a Fire, Light, Alignment, or Positive Spell causes you to be surrounded by fire and light for 5 seconds, damaging all enemies nearby every 2.5 seconds for 1d6 Fire and 1d6 Light damage per caster level. This damage will not strike dazed targets unless they are also stunned. Subsequent spellcasts extend the duration by an additional 5 seconds, up to a maximum of 15. This ability ends when you leave combat.
Your Positive Healing spells heal 1d6 extra Positive Healing per caster level. This has a cooldown of 5 seconds before it can trigger again.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Holy Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a Fire, Light, or Healing Epic Strike

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flame Pillar
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Bring a pillar of fire down on a single enemy, dealing 1d8+8 Fire damage per caster level up to a max Caster Level of 20. Cooldown 6 seconds Cost 5 Spell Points
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Healing Pillar
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Bring a pillar of positive energy down on a single ally, healing them for 3d6+6 Hit Points, plus an additional 1 per Caster Level (Maximum Caster Level: 15). This is a Conjuration spell, and counts as both a Positive and Cure Wounds spell. Can be used on Undead enemies, who take that Positive healing as damage. Cooldown 6 seconds Cost 5 Spell Points
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sun Pillar
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Bring a beam of light down on a single enemy, dealing 1d6+8 Light damage per caster level up to a max Caster Level of 20. Cooldown 6 seconds Cost 5 Spell Points.
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Bane of Undeath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Turn Undead feat, and your Turn Undead now uses your Character level instead of your Cleric or Paladin level. +[1/2/3] uses of Turn Undead. Rank 3: If you have the Improved Turning feat, increases your Turn skills DCs and max hit dice by 3.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Divine Protection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Armor Class and Physical and Magical Resistance Rating. Rank 3: +5 Fire, Light, Alignment, Positive, and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Stand And Be Judged
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Targeted foe at any range (but with line of sight) is Dazed for 8 seconds. (Taking damage breaks the Daze). Bosses and Rain Bosses do not take this effect, but this otherwise affects creatures normally immune to Daze. Cooldown: 20 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Angelic Body
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Exalted Angel Epic Destiny Mantle, you gain +5 Armor Class and Physical and Magical Resistance Rating, and you are immune to Natural Poisons and Natural Diseases.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Saving Grace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Will Saving Throws. Rank 3: You no longer fail Will Saves on a Natural 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Endless Turning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Turn Undead regenerates [10/20/30]% faster. Rank 3: When you Turn Undead, you apply Restoration to allies in the Turn.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Angelic Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a spell school to specialize in

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Conjuration DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchantment
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Enchantment DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Evocation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Evocation DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Necromancy
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Necromancy DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Noble Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a Light, Fire, or Healing SLA

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Sphere
EnhancementSelection.Description: Creates a ball of flame that rolls around slowly, burning enemies it encounters and doing 2d6 points of Fire damage. A successful Reflex save negates this effect. Cooldown: 1 minutes Cost: 15 Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mass Cure Moderate Wounds
EnhancementSelection.Description: Casts Cure Moderate Wounds on multiple targets. Positive energy is channeled to heal moderate wounds of allies or damage undead for 2d6+4 hit points plus an additional 1 for every caster level up to caster level 30. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half. Cooldown: 9 seconds Cost: 35 Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sun Bolt
EnhancementSelection.Description:
A powerful bolt of light deals 1d4+4 Light damage per caster level (up to a maximum of 15d4+60 damage at caster level 15) to targets in its path. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half, vs DC(10 + Character Level + Max(Wis/Cha) mod)
This spell is a bolt and has double range.
Cooldown: 12 seconds Cost: 12 Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Angelic Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You apply Consecrated Cinders to enemies when you damage them with your Exalted Angel Destiny Mantle, and you apply Consecrated Sparks to allies that you heal with your Exalted Angle Destiny Mantle.
Consecrated Cinders: -5 Armor Class and Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.
Consecrated Sparks: +5 Armor Class and Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Purity of Mind and Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] to Positive, Negative, and Repair Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Shadows Upon You
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you Turn Undead, foes in the area become cursed with Shadows Upon You, reducing all Saving Throws, their Armor Class, and their Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings by -1 for 20 seconds. Whenever this foe is damaged by spells or attacks, these values are reduced by an additional -1 for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Blood and Radiance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Fire, Light, Positive, Alignment, and Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Delayed Judgment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Foes affected by Stand And Be Judged must now also make Will saving throw (20 + Highest of Int/Wis/Cha modifiers + Enchantment bonuses) or be Stunned for 8 seconds. Bosses and Raid Bosses do not take this effect, but this otherwise affects creatures normally immune to Stun. If stunned, after 6 seconds they take 10d50 Fire damage and 10d50 Light damage. This damage scales with Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Holy Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Exalted Angel Destiny Mantle, you gain 15% damage absorption to all Elemental (Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, Poison, Sonic) and Alignment (Good, Evil, Lawful, Chaotic) damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Holy Command
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you hit enemies with Sun Pillar, Flame Pillar, or Healing Pillar Epic Strike they must make a Will saving throw (20 + highest of Int/Wis/Cha + Evocation bonuses) or be tripped, blinded, and made helpless for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Enhanced Metamagics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a type of Metamagic to reduce its cost

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enhanced Metamagics: Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Maximize: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you [3/6/9] fewer Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enhanced Metamagics: Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you [2/4/6] fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enhanced Metamagics: Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Quicken: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you [1/2/4] fewer Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Enhanced Angelic Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Heavenly Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select Holy Fireball or Chain Cure

EnhancementSelection.Name: Chain Cure
EnhancementSelection.Description: A powerful discharge of Positive energy strikes a primary Ally or Undead Foe for 1d6+3 Positive Healing per Caster Level and then arcs to other nearby Allies and Undead Foes hitting each of them with a similar bolt of Positive energy. (Max Caster Level: 20). This is considered a Cure Wounds spell. This spell receives reduced benefit from Spell Power. (Available Metamagics: Empower, Empower Healing, Maximize, Quicken, Enlarge, and Intensify) Cooldown: 9 seconds Cost: 40 Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Fireball
EnhancementSelection.Description: Creates a ball of fire that detonates on impact, causing an explosion of light and flame that deals 1d6+4 Light damage and 1d6+4 Fire damage per caster level to targets in its path. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. This counts as both a Fire and Light spell. (Max Caster Level: 20). (Available Metamagics: Empower Maximize Quicken Enlarge Intensify Embolden) Cooldown: 10 seconds Cost: 40 Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Blessed Water
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Effective Level for Turn Undead, +[1/2/3] to Maximum Turn Hit Dice for Turn Undead, and +[1/2/3] to Hit Dice for Turn Undead. Rank 3: If you have the Fount of Life feat, you gain +15 Armor Class and Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Ascendance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Epic Moment: Your single-target Cure Wounds spells and Healing Pillar Epic Strike you cast on any target now instead apply to all allies, regardless of distance. These spells cannot critical. Raise Dead and Resurrection spells also raise your target to full HP like True Resurrection does. Finally, your Turn Undead may now turn any type of creature instead of just Undead, will destroy anything it Turns, and you gain +3 Turn Undead Effective Level, Maximum Hit Dice, and Hit Dice per Religious Lore feat you have.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Enhanced Metamagics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a type of Metamagic to reduce its cost. Note that this ability only reduces the Spell Point cost to zero for the related Metamagic, it does not grant the Feat itself

EnhancementSelection.Name: Epic Empower Healing
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Empower Healing Metamagic no longer costs Spell Points. Note that this ability only reduces the Spell Point cost to zero for the related Metamagic, it does not grant the Feat itself.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Epic Improved Intensify
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Intensify Metamagic no longer costs Spell Points. +5 Fire, Light, Positive, Alignment, and Universal Spell Power. Note that this ability only reduces the Spell Point cost to zero for the related Metamagic, it does not grant the Feat itself.
